body.value:
{
    "title": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline1').output.pipelineName} SUCCEEDED!",
    "message": "Pipeline run finished successfully!",
    "color": "Green",
    "dataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "pipelineName": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline1').output.pipelineName}",
    "pipelineRunId": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline1').output.pipelineRunId}",
    "time": "@{utcnow()}"
}

{
    "title": "@{pipeline().Pipeline} FAILED!",
    "message": "Pipeline run finished with failed! File: @{variables('FileSource')} with problem. Please check.",
    "color": "Red",
    "dataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "pipelineName": "@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
    "pipelineRunId": "@{pipeline().RunId}",
    "time": "@{utcnow()}"
}

{
    "title": "@{pipeline().Pipeline} SUCCEEDED!",
    "message": "Pipeline run finished successfully! File: @{variables('FileSource')} Ok!",
    "color": "Green",
    "dataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "pipelineName": "@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
    "pipelineRunId": "@{pipeline().RunId}",
    "time": "@{utcnow()}"
}

source.sqlReaderQuery: select * from information_schema.tables where table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
